attributes.action: To make it illegal to park in parent and child with out young children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to start a petition to stop people with out young children parking in parent and child spaces. 
On countless times I have seen people without young children parking in parent and child parking spaces, I think it should be made illegal to park in these places as it is for people to park in disabled spaces.

A parking badge could be given in hospital to new mums or even in with child benefit letters or child tax credits letter.
Upon doing this it will help a lot of people like my self with young children get there children out of the car safely.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "To make it illegal to park in parent and child with out young children."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15246.asp

Prime Minister's Office
